name: Small Level Potion
description: The potion helps increase a small amount of Base EXP.

name: Small Ribbons
description: A pair of hair bands with the focus of color red, which makes girls look cuter.

name: Small Ribbons [1]
description: A pair of hair bands with the focus of color red, which makes girls look cuter.

name: Small Ribbons [1] Blueprint
description: A pair of hair bands with the focus of color red, which makes girls look cuter.

name: Smasher
description: If you are attacked by this mace, you will be dizzy.

name: Smile Assistant Appreciation
description: Smile Assistant publish this gift to specially thanks to all the adventurers. Open up will receive a Random Event Headwear. (Some Headwears are not included)

name: Smile Goblin Mask
description: The mask worn by the goblin is drawn with the image of a weird smile.

name: Smile Goblin Mask Blueprint
description: The mask worn by the goblin is drawn with the image of a weird smile.

name: Smile Mask
description: Smile Mask Put on it and give the world a smile.

name: Smile Mask Blueprint
description: Smile Mask Put on it and give the world a smile.

name: Smokie Doll
description: A doll designed like the Smokie living in forest, surprisingly preferred by males. It permanently increases the character's Max SP by 50 points and cannot be traded.

name: Smokie Leaf Blueprint
description: Headdress made according to the leaves used by Smokie during its transformation.

name: Smokie Leaf Headwear
description: Headdress made according to the leaves used by Smokie during its transformation.

name: Smokie Leaf [1]
description: Headdress made according to the leaves used by Smokie during its transformation.

name: Snake hairpin
description: A pretty hairpin with a snake engraved on it. It's often seen in religious stories.
